lead_paragraph: Fortinet, a maker of network security systems, has received a takeover approach from International Business Machines, two people close to the situation told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Fortinet, a maker of network-security systems, has received a takeover approach from I.B.M., according to two people close to the situation.

headline.main: I.B.M Said to Seek to Buy Fortinet

abstract: Fortinet, a maker of network-security systems, has received a takeover approach from I.B.M., according to two people close to the situation.
